original_text: For they came up with their cattle and their tents, and they came as grasshoppers for multitude; for both they and their camels were without number: and they entered into the land to destroy it.
korean_text: 이는 그들이 그들의 짐승과 장막을 가지고 올라와 메뚜기 떼 같이 많이 들어오니 그 사람과 낙타가 무수함이라 그들이 그 땅에 들어와 멸하려 하니

sentences.original_text: For they came up with their cattle
and they came as grasshoppers for multitude
for both they and their camels were without number
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 그들의 낙타는 셀 수 없을 만큼 많았습니다

sentences.original_text: and they entered into the land
